mapper.insert: insert into librarys(rki_no, book_nm_info, author_nm_info, publshcmpy_nm, publcatn_yy, res_date, id) values (#{rki_no}, #{book_nm_info}, #{author_nm_info}, #{publshcmpy_nm}, #{publcatn_yy}, now(), #{id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from librarys where rki_no = #{rki_no}
select min(res_date) from librarys where rki_no = #{rki_no}
select count(*) from librarys where id = #{id}
select count(*) from librarys where id = #{id} and rki_no = #{rki_no}
